text: Sakis Arseniou (; born 19 March 1984 in Thessaloniki) ERT. Retrieved 6 June 2015 is a Greek singer and dancer. ==Biography== Arseniou's first album, Anoiksa Ftera, was released in 2008 followed by Amartia on 21 December 2009. He achieved success and a growth of popularity in 2011, performing in Caramela, an Athens night-club. Together with his colleagues, Giorgos Tsalikis, Chrispa and Kyriakos Kianos, he has turned Caramela into one of the most popular clubs in the city. In 2013, Arseniou participated in the fourth season of the Greek version of the reality show Dancing with the Stars. "Erotoxtipimenos" is his biggest hit to date. ==Discography== *2008 - Άνοιξα φτερά *2009 - Αμαρτία *2013 - Με Κάποιον άλλον ===Single=== *2011 - Ερωτοχτυπημένος *2011 - Όλλα για όλλα *2011 - Τι λες *2011 - Πάνω κάτω *2014 - Οξυγόνο *2014 - Φίλε (ft. Κυριάκος Κυανός) *2015 - Κόλαση *2015 - Μια Πληγή *2016 - Μ' Ακούς *2016 - Φτάνει *2016 - Άδειοι Αναπτήρες *2017 - Κόκκινα Φανάρια *2017 - Σαββατιάτικα *2017 - Μη Βλέπεις Που Γελάω *2018 - Σε Θέλω Λέμε *2018 - Όσο Χρόνο Χρειαστείς *2019 - 1 & 1 ==References== ==External links== Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Greek male singers Category:Greek pop singers Category:Musicians from Thessaloniki Category:Greek contemporary laïko singers
